body.p: HPE Helion provides public, private, and managed cloud solutions to get you moving on your cloud journey. This content set contains information about the following products.

stentry.xref: HPE Helion Managed Private Cloud with Helion OpenStack

strow.stentry: A commercial-grade, managed software solution that enables customers to manage and use private cloud services based on HPE Helion OpenStack. This hardened, extensible product is designed to deliver leading open-source cloud computing while adhering tightly to OpenStack software API standards and services.

stentry.p: A platform-as-a-service (PaaS) based on Cloud Foundryâ„¢ technology and fully integrated with HPE Helion OpenStack. This product helps developers build cloud-native applications and then deploy across private and public clouds.
